name: Monk UBAB and extra attacks - Dragon version
author: TheSquid

posts.author: TheSquid
posts.content:
I am trying to understand how Monk UBAB and extra attacks work when shapeshifted, in particular in relation to the Order of Jormungandr build.

Suppose that I have a Druid/Monk/Cleric build, at level 40. In Dragon shape, my AB is 25 (base) + 19 (STR) + 6 (claws enhancement) -2 (size) +1 (EP) = 49.
Given Monk attack progression, I have 5 attacks/round, at 49/ 46/ 43/ 40/ 37 AB (assuming all are claw attacks).

Now according to the wiki, free attacks for those who use creature weapons follow the normal attack progression, which is -3 per attack for a Monk. So assuming Divine Power (counting the extra attack but not yet the bonus AB), Flurry of Blows, and Haste, my attack progression should look like 47/ 44/ 41/ 38/ 35/ 32/ 29/ 26 (in practice in my case it looks like this +10, with DP adding 5 to AB and 10 to STR).

Being a Cleric, I can buff AB with Divine Favor (5) + Divine Power (5) + Battletide, Bless, Aid, Prayer (5), plus buff STR to cap for an extra 6 AB. Now, this hits the AB bonus cap on claw attacks, so in practice I end up with 67 AB on the first attack (and not 68). The schedule would be 67/ 64/ 61/ 58/ 55/ 52/ 49/ 46 using only claw attacks. Notice that the bite attacks happen at -5 AB when fully buffed instead of -6, and correctly so.

I have tested this in the PGCC (I know the character sheet lies, I looked at the logs), and it seems to work the way I described so far, up to some possible difficulties distinguishing bite and claw attacks.

On the other hand, in the OoJ post* it seems that the claimed schedule is
+66/ +66/ +66/ +63/ +60/ +57/ +54/ +68 (Fully Buffed in Dragon Shape & Flurry of Blows)
*Notice that the OoJ has 24 BAB, so claw attacks should indeed have 1 less AB than my character.

This seems to assume that some of the free attacks happen at max AB? I think I am missing something, what am I missing?
Thanks to the community, for everything!

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content: Free attacks changed at some point (well before 1.69) from always using full BAB to following a descending progression. It's possible that that was the correct AB progression when that build was first posted, but your +67/.../+46 progression is the correct one for 1.69 / EE.

posts.author: Maximillian_Kane
posts.content:
Yunim wrote: ↑
Nov 19, 2020
Free attacks changed at some point (well before 1.69) from always using full BAB to following a descending progression. It's possible that that was the correct AB progression when that build was first posted, but your +67/.../+46 progression is the correct one for 1.69 / EE.
So, has this been changed again? Because I remember I tested this a long time ago, and the extra attacks didn't follow the Ubab progression when I tested it. How is that possible? I'm confused!

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
Free attacks work differently with normal weapons and creature weapons.
For normal weapons, the free attacks start at full BAB and descend at -5 AB, regardless of Monk APR.
For creature weapons, the free attacks continue after normal attacks and descend at -5 AB without Monk APR or -3 AB with Monk APR.
